DOC.brief_summary: Study investigational medication treatment Alzheimer 's Disease patient take Aricept , Reminyl , Exelon .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety LY451395 Patients With Probable Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Must clinical diagnosis Alzheimer 's Disease Must least 50 year age Must fluently read speak English Must reliable caregiver Has serious health problem Alzheimer 's Disease Can swallow whole pill Has menstrual period last two year Takes insulin diabetes Has take Aricept , Reminyl , Exelon last 5 week
